meanings.definition: A type of Mediterranean seaweed used for making soda ash.
meanings.sent1: The barilla from the Mediterranean is essential for making soda ash.
meanings.sent2: I bought some barilla to use in my soda ash production.
meanings.sent3: Why did the barilla go to the beach? To soak up the Mediterranean sun!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as barilla in making soda ash.
meanings.sent5: The barilla swayed gently in the Mediterranean breeze, ready to be harvested for soda ash.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta made from durum wheat.
meanings.sent1: I cooked a delicious meal with barilla pasta.
meanings.sent2: Barilla is my favorite type of pasta to use in recipes.
meanings.sent3: The barilla pasta danced in the boiling water, ready to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm bowl of barilla pasta.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of barilla filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry for dinner.

meanings.definition: A plant of the glasswort family, used in making soda ash.
meanings.sent1: The barilla plant is crucial for soda ash production.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest barilla for its use in making soda ash.
meanings.sent3: Why did the barilla plant get promoted? Because it was outstanding in its field!
meanings.sent4: The barilla plant stood tall, proud of its role in making soda ash.
meanings.sent5: The fields were filled with the vibrant green of barilla plants, ready to be processed into soda ash.
